desc:
Launch of the international Dance Your Style event, first edition in the Italian market.
IGOODI scanned the Red Bull dancers' bodies and generated their avatars, which were then animated to perform in 4 videos with 4 different dance types.
The 4 videos were then shared on the main Touchpoints of the Red Bull ecosystem, from the company website to social media platforms, generating high levels of word of mouth, engagement and viral sharing by general public and brand followers.
